checkers.flow

Interface FlowState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFlowState, NullnessFlowState

    public interface FlowState
    The state that is managed by a flow inference implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void and(FlowState other, QualifierHierarchy annoRelations)
      "And" the current state with an other state, modifying only the current state.
      FlowState copy()
      Deeply copy the state of the current flow state.
      FlowState createFlowState(Set<AnnotationMirror> annotations)
      Create a new instance of the current flow state class.
      Set<AnnotationMirror> getAnnotations()
      The current set of annotations that can be inferred.
      void or(FlowState other, QualifierHierarchy annoRelations)
      "Or" the current state with an other state, modifying only the current state.

    • Method Detail

      • createFlowState

        FlowState createFlowState(Set<AnnotationMirror> annotations)
        Create a new instance of the current flow state class. The type of the returned object has to be the same as the type of the receiver. This is used in copy() to create a new instance of the correct type.
        Parameters:
        annotations - The annotations that can be inferred.
        Returns:
        A new flow state instance.

      • getAnnotations

        Set<AnnotationMirror> getAnnotations()
        The current set of annotations that can be inferred.
        Returns:
        A reference to the set of annotations.

      • copy

        FlowState copy()
        Deeply copy the state of the current flow state. The type of the returned object has to be the same as the type of the receiver.
        Returns:
        A completely independent copy of this.

      • or

        void or(FlowState other,
      QualifierHierarchy annoRelations)
        "Or" the current state with an other state, modifying only the current state.
        Parameters:
        other - The other state, will not be modified.
        annoRelations - The relationship between the qualifiers.

      • and

        void and(FlowState other,
       QualifierHierarchy annoRelations)
        "And" the current state with an other state, modifying only the current state.
        Parameters:
        other - The other state, will not be modified.
        annoRelations - The relationship between the qualifiers.
